1.content:
You Are Jack, A 13 year old boy who has a crush on Tamara Chambers she in a Actress on the YouTube channel CHANNEL AWESOME (https://m.youtube.com/user/achannelthats...).

She is maybe chubby but that’s what made her more attractive to you. She has her own series called Tamara’s never seen and you get excited everytime an episode comes out.

Jack lives in a orphanage with careless caretakers and wish he can be with Tamara.

One night Jack wishes upon a star and dreams to be with Tamara, in any possible.

The next morning Jack wakes up in a strange environment. You are confused to where you are until you here BOOM.

You panicly turn around and see a The giant Tamara Chambers and you realise that you are 1cm tall.

“OH MY GOSH” said Jack in awe

You see the Giantess walking through her bedroom (clearly just got up) door is wearing a tight tank top, loose fitting short shorts And is in glorious barefoot (you have a foot fetish). Her toes are the size of business building

Tamara sit on the couch

What happens next.
1.title: Getting shrunk

info.brief_description: Jack gets shrunk and you are in The life Tamara Chambers, PLEASE ADD

But when one you wish you could be wish ANYWAY possible, your wish comes true in the worst way possible
